Articles.Content: about a year ago I had a mod that increaced the ram of kerbals and was good for lots of mods. I can't find one that is current for the game. I have a lot of mods and I am getting a lot of crashed. Everytime I leave the rocket assembly it crashes the game. Does anyone know of a current ram increace mod?

Your probably looking for Active Texture Management

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-90-Release-4-3-Dec-16-2014-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM!

Though in the future general question on mods should go in the General Add-on Affairs Sub forum. This Sub-Forums is for Mod releases (though one of our awesome mods will probably come along and move it any minute:P )
I got excited thinking we finally made a mod to increase RAM!
This should be in the Add-On Affairs thread

I got excited thinking we finally made a mod to increase RAM!

As did I... As did I...

I got excited thinking we finally made a mod to increase RAM!

http://www.downloadmoreram.com/

Running KSP in Linux is about the only way to get rid of the RAM limit right now.
